mgmt_ip.title: Management IP Address
mgmt_ip.description: IP address of the management interface

mgmt_gateway.title: Management Network Gateway
mgmt_gateway.description: IP address of the gateway on the management network

vmname.title: VM name
vmname.description: Name of the Virtual Machine on the Hypervisor

target_server_type.title: Target Server Type
target_server_type.description: Type of hypervisor environment where VMs will be instantiated

target_server.title: Target Server IP or FQDN
target_server.description: Hostname or IP address of the hypervisor where VM  will be instantiated. In the case of deployment in a vCenter environment, this will be the FQDN of the vCenter Server

master_vcin.title: Master VCIN hostname
master_vcin.description: The FQDN or IP address of the Master VCIN in an Active/Standby deployment. Only used when this VCIN is part of an active/standby configuration. The hostname provided here must match the hostname of another VCIN in the list of VCINs for this deployment.

vcenter_datacenter.title: vCenter Datacenter Name
vcenter_datacenter.description: Name of the vCenter Datacenter on which the VCIN VM will be deployed. Defaults to the common vCenter Datacenter Name if not defined here.

vcenter_cluster.title: vCenter Cluster Name
vcenter_cluster.description: Name of the vCenter Cluster on which the VCIN VM will be deployed. Defaults to the common vCenter Cluster Name if not defined here.

vcenter_datastore.title: vCenter Datastore Name
vcenter_datastore.description: Name of the vCenter Datastore on which the VCIN VM will be deployed. Defaults to the common vCenter Datastore Name if not defined here.

cpuset.title: KVM cpuset information
cpuset.description: Cpuset information for cpu pinning on KVM. For example, VCIN requires 6 cores and sample values will be of the form [ 0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 ]

credentials_set.title: Credentials set name
credentials_set.description: Name of the credentials set for the vsd
